ingredients.ingredient: ½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
1 pinch freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Warm milk before adding to mashed potatoes for creamier, lump-free texture
Infuse milk with green onions by heating them together for 5 minutes before stirring into potatoes
Mash potatoes while still hot to achieve the best texture and allow butter to melt thoroughly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on achieving perfectly creamy mashed potatoes and explain how infusing warm milk with green onions distributes flavor throughout the dish.
